Hi,
	Let me just check that you are asking what I think you are.  Is the question:

		Can one evolve a network using one input (say intensity) and then 
subsequently add further inputs (say "green" and "blue", redefining the 
original input as "red") and take advantage of the fact that red, green and 
blue are all "intensities" and thus candidates for processing by at least 
some sub-nets of the existing network?

	If that is right then it's a complex subject and, so I have had a few 
thoughts on it, but I'll save them until I'm sure I understood you correctly.

	Ian B
